definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: I said, "Your Honor, I had Sex before I got married."
sentences.chinese: 我说，“庭上，结婚前我就有性生活了。”

sentences.english: It is a part of their sexuality, not a partner replacement.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们性生活的一部分，性伴侣替代不了的。

sentences.english: But I believe I gained a lot by delaying my sex life.
sentences.chinese: 但我相信，正是延迟了性生活，我得到很多的收获。

sentences.english: However, three-quarters of the clients were not sexually active.
sentences.chinese: 但是，四分之三的服务对象性生活不频繁。

sentences.english: Sometimes spicing up your sex life is as simple as introducing a new toy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候给性生活调味就好像介绍一个新玩具一样简单。

sentences.english: Cosmetic Surgery: A Better Sex Life?
sentences.chinese: 整型外科手术带来较好的性生活？

sentences.english: Rubin claims the gizmo can even improve your sex life.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾说这个小发明甚至能提高你的性生活。

sentences.english: Interestingly, the number of men reporting low sexual satisfaction rose. Beckman said in an e-mail this might be because men are now more open in talking about sexual failure.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，宣称性生活满意度低的男性人数上升了。

sentences.english: After treatment, excessive frequent sex can also cause cervical erosion recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 治疗后性生活过度频繁的人，也会导致宫颈糜烂复发。

sentences.english: How do you feel about planning for sex?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待有计划地进行性生活？

sentences.english: In sexual life process, once appear, some is planted incommensurate stop instantly.
sentences.chinese: 性生活过程中，一旦出现某种不适应立即停止。

sentences.english: Their sex-life will never be dull.
sentences.chinese: 他们的性生活也从不会乏善可陈。

sentences.english: Has an active and satisfying sex life. 094.
sentences.chinese: 有活跃的并且满意的性生活。

sentences.english: Nowadays, a geisha’s sex life is her private affair.
sentences.chinese: 如今，一个艺妓的性生活已成她的隐私。

sentences.english: I blame my mother for my poor sex life.
sentences.chinese: 我把我可怜的性生活归咎于我妈妈。

sentences.english: The women of Bond continue to be portrayed in a rather limited and sex-stereotyped manner.
sentences.chinese: 邦女郎继续被塑造成有限的，单一的性生活态度。

definition: euphemism for sexual intercourse/to go to bed with sb
(of a married couple) to have intercourse/(literary) to share the same room/of the same family branch
